thing-type.label: ZEN22 Paddle Dimmer
thing-type.description: Paddle Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<ul&gt<li&gtManual or Z-Wave on/off and brightness control </li&gt <li&gtDirect 3-Way: works with regular on/off switches in a 3-way (neutral wire required)</li&gt <li&gtFully adjustable ramp rate for just the right on/off speed</li&gt <li&gtDouble tap to full brightness feature</li&gt <li&gtRemembers and restores on/off status aer power failure</li&gt <li&gtBuilt-in Z-Wave Plus signal repeater to extend network range</li&gt <li&gtWorks with LED and incandescent bulbs (don’t use with fans)</li&gt <li&gtAccepts OTA firmware updates</li&gt <li&gtCustomizable LED indicator and air-gap switch for added safety</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the upper paddle 4-5 times quickly</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtTap the lower paddle 3 times quickly</p&gt

The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.</p&gt <p&gtDefault: 60 minutes</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: Dimmer Ramp Rate
parameter.description: Dimmer Ramp Rate<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAdjust the ramp rate for your dimmer (fade-in / fade-out effect for on / off operation). Values correspond to the number of seconds it take for the dimmer to reach full brightness or turn off when operated manually.</p&gt <p&gtDefault 1 second</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Minimum brightness level
parameter.description: Minimum brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the minimum brightness level (in %) for your dimmer. You won’t be able to dim the light below the set value</p&gt <p&gtDefault 1 percent</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Maximum brightness level
parameter.description: Maximum brightness level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet the maximum brightness level (in %) for your dimmer. You won’t be able to add brightness to the light beyond the set value.</p&gt <p&gt<strong&gtNote</strong&gt: if Parameter 12 is set to value 0, Parameter 11 is automatically disabled</p&gt <p&gtDefault: 99 percent</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.description: Double Tap function<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtChoose if you want the dimmer to turn on to full brightness or custom brightness level after you double-tap the upper paddle</p&gt</p&gt
